title: David Fizdale on Heat-Lakers
description:
David Fizdale joins The Woj Pod to discuss the Lakers-Heat NBA Finals, including LeBron James’ burden to deliver a title in LA, the trying early days of the Big 3 in Miami, Erik Spoelstra's place among elite of the coaching profession, the evolution of the Pat Riley-Spo dynamic and much, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Adrian Wojnarowski
